articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture here on Sunday to mark the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments here, labor innovators and activists in the fisheries of the KPA.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, addressed the meeting.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, marked a historic event of great significance in developing the revolutionary armed forces and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche, he said.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is another illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu who has led the revolutionary armed forces while taking the road of the Songun revolution together with Kim Jong Il, prizing arms from his early age, and the most distinguished brilliant commander in our era who performed undying feats in the Juche-based cause of army-building, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's two years of leading army-building are shining with his intense loyalty and moral sense of obligation as he has firmly defended and carried forward the Juche-based military idea of Kim Jong Il and his feats performed in army-building.
					
					 It was thanks to Kim Jong Un's energetic leadership that all the commanding officers and soldiers have armed themselves with the military strategic idea, tactics and war methods of the Workers' Party of Korea and grown to be competent strategists and a-match-for-a-hundred fighters capable of successfully carrying out any operation and combat duty.
					
					 He is a master of creation who is working miracles in building a thriving nation by dint of Songun.
					
					 He unfolded a grandiose plan for building a people's paradise on this land to be envied by the world and has always led the KPA to take the lead in it.
					
					 The plan of the WPK for making this a year of the greatest heyday in construction has been successfully carried out under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, who made sure that the KPA steered the whole country to a great leap forward while creating the "speed on Masik Pass", a new a-match-for-a-hundred speed for offensive.
					
					 Many monumental edifices have sprung up in the country making a leap forward with dynamism, the overall economy is making progress full of fresh vitality and there has begun a period of renaissance in the building of a highly civilized socialist nation. Seeing this stirring reality, we deeply grasp the outstanding leadership ability of Kim Jong Un, who is realizing the dream of all service personnel and people, giving priority to the army.
					
					 Thanks to the might of the Songun politics of the WPK and its independent foreign policy the struggle for national reunification is making dynamic progress nationwide despite the vicious moves of the hostile forces against the DPRK and the international solidarity for the Korean revolution has grown stronger, Choe said, stressing:
					
					 Only victory and glory are always in store for the army and people of the DPRK guided by the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Public Presentation on Greatness of Kim Jong Un Held
articles.content:
Public Presentation on Greatness of Kim Jong Un Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A public presentation of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un was held on Saturday on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, officials of the ministry and generals and officers of the KPA.
					
					 The service personnel and people are completely attracted by Kim Jong Un and feel profound trust in him, looking up to the flag of the supreme commander, speakers noted.
					
					 Referring to the great personality of Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly brilliant Songun commander, they went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the best model of loyalty as he is opening a new chapter for carrying out the cause of immortalizing the leader.
					
					 He is developing the KPA into an elite revolutionary army and leading the confrontation with the enemy to victory.
					
					 He is the tender-hearted father adorning the country's history of love for soldiers with boundless trust in them.
					
					 He is the great leader who is ushering  in the greatest heyday of prosperity by regarding Kim Jong Il's patriotism as a driving force for the building of a thriving nation and putting forward the KPA at its head.
					
					 The KPA will uphold Kim Jong Un as the unitary center of unity and leadership, remain true to his guidance and thus provide a firm guarantee for the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: WPK Central Military Commission Hosts Banquet for Activists in Fisheries of KPA
articles.content:
WPK Central Military Commission Hosts Banquet for Activists in Fisheries of KPA
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a banquet for the participants in the meeting of activists in fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA) at Okryu Restaurant Saturday.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam and officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the participants in the above-said meeting.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, addressed the banquet.
					
					 He said that a grand banquet was given for the participants at Okryu Restaurant under the deep loving care of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un paid deep attention to the work of fisheries of the KPA to supply greater quantities of fishes to its service personnel and provided the field with modern fishing boats so that it might make big fish hauls, he said, adding:
					
					 Giving credit to the officials and fishermen in fisheries of the KPA for all these successes, Kim Jong Un showed for them such profound loving care which they would always remember.
					
					 He, representing the best wishes of all participants, extended the most profound thanks to Kim Jong Un for showing deep trust and loving care for them.
					
					 An art performance was given by employees of the restaurant for them.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Presented to DPRK Missions in Various Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Presented to DPRK Missions in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Ministries of governments, organizations and personages of various countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in their countries on Dec. 17 and 19 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar, Brazilian Centre for the Study of the Juche Idea, national chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Brazil, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.
					
					 The floral baskets were placed before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings depicting them standing together.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers' Union of Korea Denounces S. Korean Regime's Suppression of Workers
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers' Union of Korea Denounces S. Korean Regime's Suppression of Workers
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea in a statement Sunday denounced the south Korean conservative regime for harshly suppressing the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) and railway workers who turned out in a general strike to defend the right to living.
					 The fascist crackdown on the KCTU and railway workers is a thrice-cursed barbarous act of violating the elementary right to living and democracy of the popular masses, and an outright challenge to the righteous desire and wish of all the Koreans, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is impossible to live in peace even a single day with the Park Geun Hye group of traitors left intact as it has been keen on reviving the nightmare-like "yusin" fascist dictatorship through terror-ridden policy under the pretext of security and pursuing unpopular rule after seizing power by dint of frauds and high-handed practices. This is the review made by the people of the one year rule of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 Being driven into the extreme crisis, the puppet ruling forces are vainly trying to find a way out in the suppression of the popular masses. But it is a preposterous daydream. 
					
					 The masses' righteous desire and wish can never be dampened with bayonet.
					
					 Fascist dictators going against public mindset and the trend of the times can never evade stern punishment by history.
					
					 Workers, farmers and other toiling masses of south Korea who turned out in do-or-die actions for the right to existence will surely frustrate the fascist dictatorial rule and bring about new democratic society.
					
					 All the agricultural workers of the DPRK will always extend positive support and encouragement to the broad popular masses including workers and farmers of south Korea in their righteous actions to defend right to existence and democracy.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Celebrate DPRK's Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Celebrate DPRK's Anniversary
						
 Wonsan, December 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place in Wonsan Port on Sunday to mark the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The participants in the meeting laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province and paid tribute.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leone-flagged ship Chun Yang-17.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of the matchless pluck and guts, is an iron-willed commander firmly defending the country, revolution and socialism.
					
					 They referred to the noble leadership traits of Kim Jong Un, who has ceaselessly inspected forefront posts including Panmunjom and islet defence detachments in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part and KPA units, risking danger.
					
					 They wished the army and people of the DPRK great success in building a thriving nation and carrying out the cause of national reunification, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					  A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Pyongyang in Festive Mood for New Year's Day
articles.content:
Pyongyang in Festive Mood for New Year's Day
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang is now in festive mood a few days ahead of the New Year's Day.
					 Public organizations and schools have worked out programs for sports and amusement games to celebrate the New Year's Day.
					
					 The schoolchildren's New Year Performance to be given on the eve of the New Year's Day is drawing primary attention among Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Most of people in the city are very busy to redecorate their offices and dwelling houses, making programs for the New Year's Day.
					
					 Shops and restaurants are crowded with people making preparations for the New Year's Day. On the other hand, passenger service vehicles are giving overtime service for them.

articles.title: Activists in Fisheries of KPA Determined to Make Big Haul
articles.content:
Activists in Fisheries of KPA Determined to Make Big Haul
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of activists in fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA) are now spending significant days here under the deep care of the Workers' Party of Korea and citizens.
					 In this regard, KCNA had interviews with some of them on December 27.
					
					 Ko Yong Jin, manager of a fishery station, said:
					
					 I could hardly repress my surging emotion when the respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un personally conferred the party and state commendations on us one by one for a long time before having a photo session.
					
					 His bright smile still remains in my memory. I will strive to supply a large quantity of fishes to service personnel, always cherishing in my mind his great benevolence and deep trust.
					
					 Touring the Munsu Water Park and other parts of Pyongyang, we have experienced Marshal Kim Jong Un's warm love for the people. We enjoyed ourselves at the park equipped with splendid slides and tanks.
					
					 Captain Won Chang Su said:
					
					 We are very happy as the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un invited us to Pyongyang, making us known to the whole country.
					
					 Our hearts are replete with the firm resolve to repay his loving care by making big hauls.
					
					 Captain Kim Myong Su said:
					
					 Spending a happy time at the water park, I felt refreshed.
					
					 I want to come again to this water park, together with my crewmen and family members.
					
					 I will redouble my efforts to make a large catch.

articles.title: Nepalese Political Party Leader Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Nepalese Political Party Leader Supports Korean People's Just Cause
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is respected and envied by the Nepalese people and progressive mankind as it is accelerating the building of a thriving socialist nation, standing firm against the imperialist allied forces.
					 Pushpa Kamal Dahal, chairman of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), said this when meeting DPRK Ambassador to Nepal Kim Yong Su, who paid a farewell call on him on Wednesday.
					
					 The chairman went on:
					
					 We are learning a lot and gaining confidence and courage from the mental power of the Korean people, who are making dynamic progress, united close around supreme leader Kim Jong Un, and the successes achieved by the DPRK.
					
					 My party and Nepalese people will extend invariable support and encouragement to the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.

articles.title: Confrontation Maniacs Should Not Be Allowed to Play with Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Confrontation Maniacs Should Not Be Allowed to Play with Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations cannot but take the road of deterioration in the new year, too, unless the south Korean regime makes a fundamental switchover in its  "policy towards the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present south Korean ruling forces have frantically kicked up a racket of confrontation with fellow countrymen over the last one year since they seized power, touting "confidence-building process" and "theory of principle." 
					
					 The "confidence-building process" and "theory of principle" which the south Korean regime adopted as its "policy towards the north" are a vivid expression of the narrow-minded and obstinate confrontation idea of the puppet regime.
					
					 The keynote of its  "confidence-building process" is to build confidence between the north and the south on the "basis of strong deterrence" in a bid to lead the north to make a "right option" for "dismantlement of its nukes" and establish "genuine peace".
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that the "confidence-building process" will only bring tragic consequences of further bedeviling the inter-Korean relations as it is aimed to hurt fellow countrymen by denying and antagonizing their ideology and social system. 
					
					 The "principle of theory" persistently touted  by the present south Korean ruling forces is, in fact, nothing but a theory for bringing down the inter-Korean relations. This is evidenced by the fact that the essence of the theory calls for making a "framework of new relations between the south and the north" whereby the south is neither dragged by the north nor makes any concession to the latter.
					
					 It is a tragedy that the inter-Korean relations are in a state of complete bankruptcy as there is not a slight sign of improvement.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persistently pursue the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, being hostile to fellow countrymen in the north, far from drawing a lesson from the collapse of inter-Korean relations this year, they will only meet a shameful destruction, warns the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean Institute for Unification Studies again staged an anti-DPRK human rights campaign by publishing and floating "2013 white paper on human rights records in the north" peppered with all sorts of fabrications. Meanwhile, the "Saenuri Party" is working hard to fabricate an evil law for escalating the confrontation with compatriots, grumbling "it should no longer keep mum" and the "bill on human rights issues in the north" should be rammed through the "National Assembly" as early as possible.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said moves of the puppet regime can never be overlooked as they were prompted by its cynical ploy to tarnish the inviolable dignity of the DPRK and image of socialism and stoke the north-south confrontation.
					
					 Such despicable ruckus staged by the south Korean conservative forces under the signboard of human rights is an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation and mockery of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who protect their leader and social system, regarding them as dearer than their own lives.
					
					 The bloody "yusin" dictatorship is being revived and democracy and human rights are mercilessly violated in south Korea.
					
					 The puppet conservatives are a group of criminals who should sit in the dock at a human rights tribunal.
					
					 The present regime has its roots in the past ill-famed "yusin" dictatorship. It can never conceal its despicable true colors as the worst regime opposed to democracy and shuddering human rights abuser.
					
					 The commentary discloses the ulterior aims sought by the dictatorial maniacs in groundlessly finding fault with the human rights performance in the DPRK though they are utterly indifferent to the dignity and human rights of people.
					
					 The conservative group, afraid of the danger of being ousted from power right now, is getting evermore desperate in its anti-DPRK human rights campaign as it did in the past, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is also designed to divert elsewhere the public attention and calm down their mounting anti-"government" sentiment at any cost.
					
					 The group should properly know that with no desperate frenzy can it escape its fate already sealed.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression of KCTU under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression of KCTU under Fire 
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) --  Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet authorities hurled police into the operation of searching the headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) without search warrant. The police pounded the entrance door of the headquarters with a hammer and searched offices, firing tear liquid and walking away at least 130 unionists who protested against the tyrannical action. 
					 This is a revelation of the criminal ploy to tide over their daily worsening ruling crisis, Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 South Korean people of all social standings are waging dynamic actions in demand of the resignation of the puppet chief executive, who took office after wooing public mindset through the election that had been rigged with the help of the government power. Timed to coincide with this, railway workers launched a strike in protest against the privatization of railway service, and other labor circles are joining them, further deteriorating the ruling crisis of the regime.
					
					 The puppet authorities, upset by this, are trying to find a way out in the fascist suppression of the people. The aim sought by them is to create an extremely terror-ridden atmosphere in the whole of south Korean society through such merciless fascist suppression and deter the people and trade union organizations from turning out in the anti-"government" struggle. The clear proof of this is the fact that they live-broadcasted the search of the KCTU headquarters.
					
					 The puppet authorities will have to pay dearly for their crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Ignoring Youth Unemployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Ignoring Youth Unemployment
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People posted an editorial on Thursday accusing the puppet regime of overlooking the youth's unemployment.
					 It blamed Park Geun Hye for suggesting only part-time jobs for  young people though she promised to set the youth's employment as a major task of her "government" early in her office. 
					
					 Part-time jobs inflict low wage and unstable employment upon  young people, it noted, adding:
					
					 Angry students are now taking to the street to protest the regime.
					
					 Against this backdrop, Park blustered at Chongwadae that the settlement of the youth's unemployment is her supreme task, but such remarks will no more work on them.
					
					 It called on the young people to stage a dynamic campaign together with all people suffering under the Park's regime in order to settle the youth issue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The 46th issue of the Russian paper Patriot carried full texts of Marshal Kim Jong Un's works "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" and "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism."
					 The first work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the idea that it is a principled requirement for triumphantly advancing the Korean revolution to invariably hold in high esteem leader Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The second work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his patriotic life.
					
					 It also deals with important issues for embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The paper was illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversaries Observed by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversaries Observed by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Seminars were held by the Socialist Party of Romania, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia between Dec. 21 and 23.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Romanian party said that Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to bolster up the nation's defence capability with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership.   
					
					 The present situation where the imperialists are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK clearly proves the validity of the Songun politics, he noted, adding:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Il the Korean People's Army became a matchless revolutionary army.
					
					 His shining Songun leadership feats will always be remembered by the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater success in the work for building an economic power and bolstering up the defence capability under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un in the future, too.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh group said that Kim Jong Il's assumption of KPA supreme commandership 22 years ago marked an event of historic significance in defending and glorifying socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 The deputy manager of the Indonesian company stressed that the seminar offered him an opportunity to know better about the fact that the distinguished exploits of Kim Jong Suk are always enshrined in the minds of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Indonesian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Indonesian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian paper Siputar Indonesia on Dec. 23 dedicated an article titled "Image always remembered by people" to the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, a prominent great woman of modern Korea, made distinguished contributions to the liberation of Korea and the building of a new country. Her noble image as an anti-Japanese war hero and an outstanding revolutionary is enshrined in the minds of the Korean people and other progressive people across the world.
					
					 The article gave a detailed account of the facts that organizations and units in various countries were named after her and progressive mankind conferred honorary titles, medals, gifts, etc. upon her.
					
					 It also referred to the fact that a lot of books, poems and songs praising her noble life have been published and created, adding:
					
					 Meetings, seminars, lectures, round-table talks, book and photo exhibitions, film shows and other political and cultural events take place in various countries and regions every year to mark the anniversaries of her birth and death.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk is always alive in the hearts of mankind.
